Author: Coka2209
Title: [ANN][OPL][2018] OnPlace Inc. - Become an investor of private companies
Body: They want to create a tool for people that don't know much about analysis and investing and give them all the necessary information so a newbie with money can invest in startups and new companies. I see it as easily exploited platform, with a lot of people that will get scammed because of companies failing to prospect or just simply vanishing with money. If someone wants to invest in something he should do a research himself or hire educated people and not rely on a third-party site that will tell him what's good to put money in.

Author: onplace
Title: [ANN][OPL][2018] OnPlace Inc. - Become an investor of private companies
Body: Our last ICO was cancelled and all of the investers were refunded. Since we didn't receive any money from that ICO, neither did our previous bounty participants. And since the two ICOs are different, in order to become a bounty participant in this current one, you will need to register again with our bounty manager. Further information can be found here: https://bounty.onplace.io/

Author: onplace
Title: [ANN][OPL][2018] OnPlace Inc. - Become an investor of private companies
Body: Yes, of course. You can find all the information here: https://crowdsale.onplace.io/ Thank you for your interest

Author: onplace
Title: [ANN][OPL][2018] OnPlace Inc. - Become an investor of private companies
Body: Yes, there have been some dramatic changes in our strategies. And also one our key VC collaborators recommended us to cancel the campaign.

Author: onplace

Author: PNToken
Title: [ANN][OPL][2018] OnPlace Inc. - Become an investor of private companies
Body: Who chooses the company? And who and how will be responsible if you lose money in these investments?

Author: onplace
Title: [ANN][OPL][2018] OnPlace Inc. - Become an investor of private companies
Body: We carefully analyze and offer various interesting companies in the MOW. And the community decides, which of these companies it is interested in. Of course, depending on the interests of the community, our offers will also change.  In this way, everyone personally chooses, where to invest their money. We are only responsible for creating an environment and providing instruments through which you can invest.
